title: (ALL SOLD) T206 Cobb red (Old Mill), Beckley, yellow Chance
author: itjclarke

posts.post_title: (ALL SOLD) T206 Cobb red (Old Mill), Beckley, yellow Chance
posts.post_content:
Selling off some dupes, all prices DLVD, payment by MO/Paypal FF accepted.  Offers are welcome. Slightly higher res pics/larger JPGs available by email. If interested please email me- [url]itjclarke@yahoo.com[/url] (no PM's please, box near full). Thanks for looking!

T206 Cobb red portrait, raw.  Tougher back, appears fair to good, a couple wrinkles, some surface wear, but looks great in hand- (SOLD)
